description: Commands to configure constumer private DNS zone with Azure Spring Apps.

commands.name: az spring private-dns-zone add
commands.summary: Commands to add a constumer private DNS zone with Azure Spring Apps.
examples: az spring private-dns-zone add --service MyAzureSpringAppsInstance --resource-group MyResourceGroup --zone-id MyPrivateDNSZoneId

commands.name: az spring private-dns-zone clean
commands.summary: Commands to clean up constumer private DNS zone in Azure Spring Apps.
examples: az spring private-dns-zone clean --service MyAzureSpringAppsInstance --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az spring private-dns-zone update
commands.summary: Commands to update constumer private DNS zone in Azure Spring Apps.
examples: az spring private-dns-zone update --service MyAzureSpringAppsInstance --resource-group MyResourceGroup --zone-id MyPrivateDNSZoneId
